data.message: Rap is dead and so is the Hip Hop scene, all this mainstream self esteem got niggas running tracks like phenes, drop the album before Kim drops Atomics, Fuck Trumps Economics, Em's slander is our only saviour, stand the fuck up and let us taste that Audio Flavour!
